resources.string: Hi I\'m %1$s bot! How can I help you?
I understand you want to start over: %1$s
I understand you want to undo: %1$s
Here is the weather: %1$s
Failed to send the query.
Below are the existing knowledge…
Below are the raw knowledge…
I don\'t understand this intent.
I can\'t read from the server response.
OK. Let\'s try again.
Executing the script…
The execution is completed!
Can\'t recognize your response. Please respond with \"Yes\" or \"No\".
OK.
Do you want me to execute it now?
How do I tell whether %1$s?
I don\'t understand how to %1$s, can you tell me which app I can use? You can also say \"demonstrate\" to teach this task by demonstration.
Please start demonstrating how to %1$s. Click OK to continue.
Please start demonstrating how to find out the value of %1$s. Click OK to continue.
How do I find out the value for %1$s? You can explain, or say \"demonstrate\" to teach this value by demonstration."
Should I do anything if %1$s is not true?
OK, I know what to do when %1$s is not true.
What should I do if %1$s is not true?
Please start demonstrating what to do when %1$s is not true. Click OK to continue.
Please choose the correct one that reflects your intention, or choose \"Try Again\" to give a different instruction.
OK. Let\'s try again. Please try to explain using information that can be found in mobile apps.
I can\'t understand your utterance, please try again
Is this correct?
Updating the value of [%1$s] to \"%2$s\"…
I think what you meant is:
